card.name: Koromon (ST1-01)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] If this Digimon has 4 or more Evolution Sources, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.

card.name: Agumon (ST1-03)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] This Digimon gets +1000 DP.

card.name: Coredramon (ST1-06)
card.text: [Blocker](When your opponent's Digimon attacks, if this Digimon is Active, you may make it the target of that attack by Resting it.) [When it attacks] Memory -2.

card.name: Greymon (ST1-07)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[Security Attack +1](When this Digimon attacks Security, it checks +1 more.)

card.name: Garudamon (ST1-08)
card.text: [When Evolving] During this turn, 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP.

card.name: MetalGreymon (ST1-09)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] When this Digimon is blocked, +3 Memory.

card.name: WarGreymon (ST1-11)
card.text: [During your turn] For every 2 of this Digimon's Evolution Sources, it gets [Security Attack +1]. (When this Digimon attacks Security, increase the number checked by 1.)

card.name: Yagami Taichi (ST1-12)
card.text:
[During your turn] All of your Digimon get +1000 DP.
[Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Shadow Wing (ST1-13)
card.text:
[Main Phase] During this turn, 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP.
[Security] Until the end of your next turn, all of your Digimon get [Security Attack +1]. (When it attacks Security, increase the number checked by 1.)

card.name: Starlight Explosion (ST1-14)
card.text:
[Main Phase] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your Security Digimon get +7000 DP.
[Security] During this turn, your Security Digimon get +7000 DP.

card.name: Giga Destroyer (ST1-15)
card.text:
[Main Phase] Destroy up to 2 of your opponent's 4000 DP or less Digimon.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: Gaia Force (ST1-16)
card.text:
[Main] Destroy 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: Tsunomon (ST2-01)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] When it battles an opponent's Digimon with no Evolution Sources, it gets +1000 DP.

card.name: Gabumon (ST2-03)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[When it attacks] Remove the lowest Evolution Source from 1 of your opponent’s Level 5 or less Digimon.

card.name: Garurumon (ST2-06)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[When it attacks] Remove the lowest Evolution Source from 1 of your opponent’s Digimon.

card.name: Grizzmon (ST2-07)
card.text: [Blocker](When your opponent's Digimon attacks, if this Digimon is Active, you may make it the target of that attack by Resting it.) [When it attacks] Memory -2.

card.name: WereGarurumon (ST2-08)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] While your opponent has a Digimon with no Evolution Sources, this Digimon gets [Security Attack +1]. (When this Digimon attacks Security, increase the number checked by 1.)

card.name: Zudomon (ST2-09)
card.text: [When evolving] Remove the 2 lowest Evolution Sources from 1 of your opponent’s Digimon.

card.name: MetalGarurumon (ST2-11)
card.text: [When it attacks][Once per turn] Make this Digimon Active.

card.name: Ishida Yamato (ST2-12)
card.text:
[At the beginning of your turn] When your opponent has a Digimon without an Evolution Source, +1 Memory.
[Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Hammer Spark (ST2-13)
card.text:
[Main] +1 Memory.
[Security] +2 Memory.

card.name: Sorrow Blue (ST2-14)
card.text:
[Main] Choose 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with no Evolution Sources. Until the end of their next turn, that Digimon cannot attack or block.
[Security] Choose 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with no Evolution Sources. Until the end of your next turn, that Digimon cannot attack or block.

card.name: Kaiser Nail (ST2-15)
card.text:
[Main] Choose a Digimon Card in your Digimon’s Evolution Sources, and place it as a new Digimon without paying the cost.
[Security] Activate this card’s [Main] effect.

card.name: Cocytus Breath (ST2-16)
card.text:
[Main] Return 1 of your opponent’s Digimon to their hand. Discard its Evolution Sources.
[Security] Activate this card’s [Main] effect.

card.name: Tokomon (ST3-01)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] [Once per turn] When your opponent’s Digimon is destroyed by having its DP reduced to 0, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.

card.name: Patamon (ST3-04)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] [Once per turn] When your opponent’s Digimon is destroyed by having its DP reduced to 0, +1 Memory.

card.name: Angemon (ST3-05)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[When it attacks] If you have 4 or more Security, Memory +1.

card.name: Unimon (ST3-07)
card.text: [Blocker](When your opponent’s Digimon attacks, if this Digimon is Active, you may make it the target of that attack by Resting it.) [When it attacks] Memory -2.

card.name: HolyAngemon (ST3-08)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[When it attacks] During this turn, 1 of your opponent’s Digimon gets -1000 DP.

card.name: Angewomon (ST3-09)
card.text: When the number of your Security becomes 1 or less, [Recovery +1 (Deck)]. (Place 1 card from the top of your deck into the top of your Security.)

card.name: Seraphimon (ST3-11)
card.text: [When it attacks] During this turn, 1 of your opponent’s Digimon gets -4000 DP.

card.name: Takaishi Takeru (ST3-12)
card.text:
[During your opponent’s turn] All of your Security Digimon get +2000 DP.
[Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

card.name: Heaven's Gate (ST3-13)
card.text:
[Main Phase] During this turn, 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP.
[Security] During this turn, all of your Digimon and Security Digimon get +5000 DP. Then add this card to your hand.

card.name: Heaven's Charm (ST3-14)
card.text:
[Main] During this turn, 1 of your opponent’s Digimon gets -2000 DP.
[Security] Add this card to your hand.

card.name: Holy Flame (ST3-15)
card.text:
[Main] Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, 1 of their Digimon gets [Security Attack -3]. (Decrease the number of Security this Digimon checks by 3.)
[Security] During this turn, all of your opponent’s Digimon get [Security Attack -1]. (Decrease the number of Security this Digimon checks by 1.)

card.name: Seven Heavens(ST3-16)
card.text:
[Main Phase] During this turn, 1 of your opponent’s Digimon gets -10000 DP.
[Security] Activate this card’s [Main Phase] effect.

card.name: Agumon (P-001)
card.text: [When placed] Destroy 1 of your opponent’s 3000 DP or less Digimon.

card.name: Piyomon (P-002)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] When this Digimon destroys your opponent’s Digimon by battle, [1 Draw.] (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

card.name: Gabumon (P-003)
card.text: [When placed] Discard the lowest Evolution Source of 1 of your opponent’s Digimon.

card.name: Gomamon (P-004)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] [Once per turn] When an opponent Digimon’s Evolution Source is removed, +1 Memory.

card.name: Patamon (P-005)
card.text: [When placed] When your Security is 1 or less, [Recovery +1 (Deck)]. (Place 1 card from the top of your deck into the top of your Security.)

card.name: Tailmon (P-006)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] If your Security is 3 or more, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.

card.name: Garurumon (P-007)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[When it attacks] If this Digimon’s name includes “Garurumon,” [1 Draw]. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

card.name: WereGarurumon (P-008)
card.text:
[When it attacks][Once per turn] If this Digimon has a “Garurumon” in its Evolution Sources, make this Digimon Active.
(Evolution Source)[During your turn] If the number of cards in your hand is 8 or greater, this Digimon gets [Security Attack +1]. (When it attacks Security, it checks 1 more.)

card.name: Agumon (P-009)
card.text: (Evolution Source)[During your turn] If this Digimon’s name includes “Greymon,” it gets +2000 DP.

card.name: Greymon (P-010)
card.text: [During your turn] If there is an “Agumon” in this Digimon’s Evolution Sources, it gets [Security Attack +1].

card.name: Leomon (BT1-034)
card.text: [When destroyed] Summon 1 Child-level Digimon from this Digimon’s Evolution Sources without paying the cost.
